intents.name: Summarize Financial News
intents.description: Provides concise summaries of the latest financial news and its potential impact on the market.
examples: What are the key takeaways from the latest earnings report of Apple?
How might the new regulations affect the banking sector?

name: News Summarization Agent
scope: Extracts key insights from financial news, earnings reports, and regulatory updates to assess their impact on the stock market.
